action.action-desc: Ms. Jackson Lee introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require a report by the Comptroller General of the United States on a national all-hazards disaster insurance program.

section.text: Not later than 320 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Comptroller General of the United States shall submit to Congress a report onâ€”

paragraph.text: the feasibility and design of a national all-hazards disaster insurance program;
the risk of property owners continuing to underinsure or have no insurance on homes and the implications of those actions on the financial stability of the housing market;
the challenge of developing actuarial tables to determine premiums and the setting options for premium payments for disaster declaration policies to be collected annual, quarterly, or monthly; and
the challenges and feasibility of selling policies at the same time a property casualty policy is purchased.
